title: Knowledge-Sharing Strategies in Augmented Reality-Based Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone and Mobile App Usage Skills, Fundamental Understanding of Inquiry-Based Learning
context.additional_context: Conducts field learning using AR technology and mobile devices within university campuses or designated spaces.

learning_goals: Learners perform knowledge-sharing activities with peers using a 5-step guided mechanism in an AR environment.
Learners design and execute inquiry activities combining real-world environments with digital content via location-based AR tools.
Learners achieve over 80% knowledge-construction interaction during group collaboration and enhance peer feedback skills.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
